roleset.name: ensure something stays below a certain level
roleset.note: RESTRICT-V NOTES: VerbNet Class limit-76. Actually two quite different rolesets, but with the same PAS exceptfor the prepositions each takes. That difference makes the two senseseasy to distinguish. (from restrict.01-v)

example.name: restrict to
example.text: The golden share restricts any individual holding to 15% and expires at the end of 1990.

example.name: restrict from
example.text: The partnership said it is proposing the change largely because the provisions of its senior notes restrict it from making distributions on its units outstanding.
example.arg: the provisions of its senior notes
from making distributions on its units outstanding

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: Aieed rendered UNOSOM ineffective through his restriction of the UN Pakistani troop deployment.
example.arg: of the UN Pakistani troop deployment
